description: Tired of lame fart/burp apps?  Look no further!  Now for the Touch Pad comes Joe's Extravagant Gastrual Pack!  In this app you will get three apps in one!  Joe will fart, burp, and even hear his ghastly stomach growls.  Beware, if your afraid of toilet humor, or find South Park, Family Guy, or the Simpsons offensive, this app may not fit your fancy. But if a good old gross fart or burp makes you smile, this one is for you.  Also included is the time bomb, set the timer to a ghastly noise, and wait for the noise to surprise an unexpected person.  As you press any sound, our chracter named "Joe" does a special pose for you as he passes gas, rumbles off a belch, or grumbles his tummy.  Oh and hey, feel free to send us your own fart/burp/stomach sounds! We would be happy to add them! As always if you have any problems, bugs, or feature requests please EMAIL us and let us know.
